page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN NORTHWOLD
page.content: Buses and Coaches provide a valuable service as only about half the families own a car. Carters,a private coach firm from Foulden,operates a comprehensive service primarily to the weekly markets in the local towns.It also links the villages. On Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays there is a return journey to Kings Lynn;on Wednesdays a return journey to Watton; on Fridays a return journey to Downham Market;on Saturdays additional return journeys to Swaffham and Norwich.No coaches run on Sundays or Mondays. In addition special services are arranged to meet local demands - for example to the annual Sandringham Flower Show and for late night Christmas shopping in Norwich. A daily bus service from Brandon to Downham Market via Northwold is run by Eastern Counties Bus Company.
